events.name: Tech & Cryptocurrency
events.description:
Ever wondered how does ICOs work? How secure are your bitcoins? What applications can we build using Bitcoin as a platform? Or if cryptocurrencies be regulated? 

At this exclusive panel event, we host thought-leaders from a specific industry — this time from the Cryptocurrency world — to explore new intersections between their field and technology.

Leaders in the Cryptocurrency community will break down the biggest challenges and opportunities they face with the rise of new technology, and explain how their teams adapt to the fast pace of innovation.

Speakers:
-Kenrick Drijkoningen , Head of Growth, Golden Gate Ventures
-Adriel Ho , Certified Bitcoin Professional (C4)
-Marcelo García Casil, Founding Partner, Maecenas
-Zach Piester, Co- Founder | Chief Development Officer, Intrepid Ventures
- Chris Miess, Founder & CEO, Iconic Capital

Why It Matters: 
The omnipresence of technology has rapidly transformed lives over the last decade (remember, the iPhone was only released in 2007). Now, it’s rare to go about a regular day without interacting with tech — whether it’s an alarm app that wakes you up, your Nest Thermostat-regulated apartment, or the software you use at work. Staying ahead of the innovation curve and being able to predict the future of tech in various industries has never been more important — both at work and at play.

Agenda:
-Check-in & Networking 6:30 - 7:00 pm
-Panel/Lighting Talks 7:00 - 7:45 pm
-Q&A and Networking 7:45 - 8:15 pm

Takeaways
Gain insight and inspiration from experts in Cryptocurrency and -Blockchain technology. Expand your understanding of today's ---Bitcoin world, and fuel your own ideas for the future.

-Trends in the Bitcoin world. 
-Regulations related to Cryptocurrencies. 
-What an ICO is and how it works.
-How companies can raise money using an ICO.
-Building your network with others interested in Blockchain & Cryptocurrency.
events.location: NTUC Centre Auditorium Level 7, 1 Marina Boulevard  Singapore,
